meanings.definition: A person who applies flameproofing materials.
meanings.sent1: The flameproofers worked diligently to protect the building from fire hazards.
meanings.sent2: The flameproofers were hired to treat the curtains with fire-resistant chemicals.
meanings.sent3: The flameproofers joked that they were like wizards casting fire-repelling spells.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fire safety, flameproofers are the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The image of flameproofers in their protective gear is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: A substance used to make materials resistant to flames.
meanings.sent1: The flameproofers were carefully applied to the stage curtains before the big show.
meanings.sent2: The factory used flameproofers to ensure the safety of their products.
meanings.sent3: The flameproofers were so effective that even a dragon's breath couldn't ignite them.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a coat of flameproofers, shielding her from criticism.
meanings.sent5: The smell of flameproofers lingered in the air, assuring us of our safety.
